attributes.action: Kids with allergies must have a right to eat own food without discrimination.
attributes.background: We were publicly shamed for bringing son’s allergen free food to a play centre. I was told that if he does eat it he has to keep it hidden and eat it under the table. I’ve heard of many similar stories. Allergies mean life or death and parents don’t want to risk feeding children food made elsewhere.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
